divs: Sighting DetailsOut to have a smoke. Layed on my car looking at stars when I noticed this "thing" why above jets that were flying overhead. I even woke my wife to look at it. she saw it but wasn't as interested. I want to get back outside to watch it some more
Summary: 3 lights triangle in shape was hovering
